text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the shape.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the rectangle $ABND$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $3$ units.
The measure of angle $ANB$ is $62$ degrees.
The length of the line $AB$ is equal to the length of the line $DN$.
The length of the line $AD$ is equal to the length of the line $BN$.
The line $AD$ is perpendicular to the line $ND$.
The line $AB$ is perpendicular to the line $BN$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $BN$, $ND$, and $AD$ forming a rectangle $ABND$.
The line $AN$ is a diagonal of the rectangle.

point_positions.D: Point D is not given but is part of the rectangle $ABND$.
